content: Review authentication & authorization security - Supabase auth, JWT handling, RBAC, session management
Analyze input validation & sanitization - XSS, SQL injection, CSRF protections, file uploads
Review API security - rate limiting, authentication, CORS, error handling, information disclosure
Examine data security & privacy - sensitive data handling, encryption, data retention, logging
Analyze infrastructure security - env vars, secrets management, security headers, dependencies
Review client-side security - localStorage usage, secret exposure, CSP, XSS protections
Compile comprehensive security report with CVSS ratings and remediation steps
